title: Waiver Wire! Which Replacement RB to Pick? (10/20 Fantasy Football Podcast)
description:
It's a fairly exciting waiver wire week with Boston Scott, Giovani Bernard, Justin Jackson and even JaMycal Hasty as possible options. Plus Travis Fulgham is still available! Basically, the Eagles take center stage this week. We'll give you our top priorities (2:55), discuss Travis Fulgham (15:33) and talk FAB (18:45) ... News and notes (27:30) plus a quick glance at the top priorities at each position (35:00). TE is pretty deep with options this week, but can we say the same thing about QB? You should be able to find a solid DST on waivers. And then we recap Chiefs-Bills (43:10) and Cardinals-Cowboys (47:50). Can we trust the Bills running game of the Cowboys passing game going forward? ... Dropometer (51:35)! And then a deeper look at wavier wire positions (52:45) ... Email us at fantasyfootball@cbsi.com
Listen to the brand new Fantasy Football Today in 5 podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/fantasy-football-today-in-5/id1528634304
'Fantasy Football Today' is available on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, Stitcher, Google Podcasts, Castbox, and wherever else you listen to podcasts.
Follow the new FFT Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/FFToday
Follow our FFT team on Twitter: @FFToday, @AdamAizer, @JameyEisenberg, @daverichard, @heathcummingssr, @BenSchragg
Watch FFT on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCviK78rIWXhZdFzJ1Woi7Fg/videos
Join our Facebook group https://www.facebook.com/groups/FantasyFootballToday/

itunes:title: Waiver Wire! Which Replacement RB to Pick? (10/20 Fantasy Football Podcast)
itunes:author: CBS Sports, Fantasy Football, Rookies, Rankings, Waiver Wire
itunes:subtitle: Which replacement RB should you prioritize? Are we all about the Eagles this week? TE and DST seem pretty deep this week, but what about QB? Also: a case to sell Derrick Henry
